news.title: Microsoft says its AI diagnoses patients more accurately than doctors
news.summary: New research finds that AI-driven diagnostic tools may be more effective than human medical workers when it comes to accurate diagnosis. Microsoft (MSFT) AI Diagnostic Orchestrator (MAI-DxO) correctly diagnosed up to 85% of cases, an accuracy rate more than four times that of a group of experienced physicians. Microsoft AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman joins Opening Bid with Yahoo Finance Executive Editor Brian Sozzi to discuss the findings of the report and the role of AI in the future of medical diagnostic testing analysis. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid here.

news.title: Premier League forms five-year AI partnership with Microsoft
news.summary: Audiences and fans will be able to learn about Premier League clubs, players, matches through an AI companion powered by Microsoft's Copilot which can pull information from over 30 seasons of stats, 300,000 articles and 9,000 videos, they said.  AI has strongly resonated with sports leagues and sports entertainment companies as they look to streamline the vast troves of data to attract larger audiences and drive engagement.  The Premier League, England's top soccer league, is also migrating its core digital infrastructure to Microsoft Azure to allow for easier AI integration and create a unified platform for the league.
